resources.string: We need to listen to system notification service to do all things. Please enable it in the System Notification Service Permission setting panel.
Sorry, it seems that the system settings isn\'t writable, please grant me the system settings writing permission.

You have already set AOD mode to always on, and the work of this app is to notify you using AOD. this app is useless for you. So if you want to continue, please change AOD mode to other mode(such as tap to show or schedule to show).
Disable service while airplane mode on
Enable it can save your battery. Usually you go to sleep with your phone\'s airplane mode turned on and the AOD is not necessary at that moment
Between the start time and end time you set below, the service disable itself every day in this time
Only the selected apps can be effected

When a notification comes, Light up the screen for seconds. If you enable screen off edge light and check this app in system edge light settings, then screen off edge light will be shown instead of turning screen on (edge light info is empty, never be fixed, please see the source code)
